text: God is Great may refer to: *The Takbir, the Arabic phrase "Allāhu Akbar", often translated as "God is Great" *God Is Great and I'm Not (Dieu est grand, je suis toute petite), a 2001 French film *God is Great (no. 2), a 1991 sculpture by John Latham ==See also== *God Is Not Great, a 2007 book by Christopher Hitchens *God Is Good (disambiguation)
title: God is great
